gnu.crypto.key.dh
Class RFC2631

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--gnu.crypto.key.dh.RFC2631
public class RFC2631
extends java.lang.Object

An implementation of the Diffie-Hellman parameter generation as defined in RFC-2631.

Reference:

  1. Diffie-Hellman Key Agreement Method
    Eric Rescorla.
